title: List of all Android svg animation  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android svg animation  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: RoadRunner
repoList.description: Road Runner is a library for android which allow you to make your own loading animation using a SVG image

repoList.name: AnimatedVectorDrawableDemo
repoList.description: Android does not support SVGs (Scalable Vector Graphics) directly, Lollipop introduced new class called VectorDrawable, AnimatedVectorDrawable which allows to draw assets and animation in a similar fashion using only code.Later VectorDrawable and AnimatedVectorDrawable is available from Support Library 23.2. This Android app implements animation using Animated Vector Drawable support library.
